text: RT @NRDC “If we don’t take immediate action, the storied North Atlantic right whale could go extinct in our lifetime,” Senator Cory Booker said while introducing The SAVE Right Whales Act of 2018, an act designed to enforce protection for the endangered whale. https://t.co/7iDD02NaOe

RT @AdamSchiffCA No spin can change the fact that the Trump Administration made a conscious decision to tear children away from their parents. They are using the most vulnerable as a bargaining chip for the President’s Wall. This is repulsive. https://twitter.com/CNNPolitics/status/1008730560171315204 QT @CNNPolitics "We will not apologize": Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen defends the Trump administration's immigration policy https://trib.al/1osac6s http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df-7GSbWkAE2BiO.jpg

RT @RealAfroScholar Honored to have been asked to share my story and a bit about my hometown of #NewarkNJ. Between #Princeton, #YaleLaw, and a #RhodesScholarship, I’ve spent my life preparing to help improve my city. I’m so excited to see the transformation taking place now! #GiveBack http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1007792089805930496/pu/img/dZQTIypnZNyMVeEK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1007792089805930496/pu/vid/240x240/GgHGOmy-mJY8zG-O.mp4?tag=3

This Administration has been talking about family separation as a deterrent since March of last year. Watch this. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1008700887018147841/pu/img/3wUYDbQohM04TwCW.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1008700887018147841/pu/vid/240x240/OV5c44LBCOJUUB13.mp4?tag=3

Parents are being deported without their children, many of whom are under the age of 4. Congress can’t let the scale of this human rights abuse grow any larger. We must pass the #KeepFamiliesTogether Act or demand the Administration end this cruel policy. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/06/17/us/immigration-deported-parents.html

RT @prernaplal The 1997 Flores Agreement that the Trump Administration is now attacking does not call for separating families.

Flores was a hard fought victory to prevent child abuse and detention.

Do not let anyone tell you otherwise

#ProtectFlores, a thread

RT @TexasTribune New: Ted Cruz announced emergency legislation to keep immigrant families together after they cross the border into the United States. https://www.texastribune.org/2018/06/18/ted-cruz-immigrant-families-together-border-texas/?utm_campaign=trib-social&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&utm_content=1529360463
Callously ripping helpless children away from their mothers and families goes against our values and who we are. #KeepFamiliesTogether http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df_lU91XcAENkuN.jpg

RT @amzam U.S. Sen. @TedCruz has introduced legislation to keep immigrant families together "absent aggravated criminal conduct or threat of harm to the children." The emergency legislation also calls for: https://www.texastribune.org/2018/06/18/ted-cruz-immigrant-families-together-border-texas/?utm_campaign=trib-social-buttons&utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social via @TexasTribune http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgAmOSOUEAAIouu.jpg

RT @anastasianylon Family detention under Obama was appalling and ultimately did not work; separating children from their parents is even worse and tragically likely to be equally ineffective.   https://www.nytimes.com/2018/06/16/us/politics/family-separation-trump.html

This must stop, before thousands more kids are separated from their parents at the border. These kids should not be used as legislative leverage for a border wall — Congress must demand the Administration end this or pass our #KeepFamiliesTogether Act now.
https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/news/us-could-be-holding-30-000-border-kids-by-august-officials

Currently govt must either release parents & continue incentive for illegal entry with children or separate families by detaining parents. Neither is good. Lets change the law to allow families to be held together at family facilities & shorten detention with expedited hearings

We had a great time playing basketball and raising over $80,000 for charity on Saturday!

Watch highlights from the game and support @generation1TX's work here: https://generationone.net/donation #KimmelvsCruz 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ls8N89kGmqs

The United States of America is not and must never be about locking up little children in cages on the southern border. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1008811817743929345/img/q7QHa0FzHl-eNHwZ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1008811817743929345/vid/320x180/85epEEESHHJU0j6x.mp4?tag=2

This is how our government is treating children at the border. There’s only one way to describe this: our government is committing a human rights abuse along the southern border. Call your representatives, and tell them to demand this Administration #KeepFamiliesTogether. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df_a3dBWkAA-gKZ.jpg

Trump could—at any time—end this morally bankrupt policy of ripping children away from their parents at the border. It's on all of us to put pressure on this administration to do the right thing and end this cruelty. https://twitter.com/vicenews/status/1008754564785430528 QT @vicenews Trump is blaming his family separation policy on Democrats. That's not true. Trump's own attorney general, Jeff Sessions, announced and implemented the policy in May. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1008753272973398026/img/-sYOU0JOuHM8ky3r.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1008753272973398026/vid/240x240/frW3e6EYjDMmI5lF.mp4?tag=2

"It's all political. The president is throwing red meat to his base." https://trib.al/7J8z5T4 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1008094328592322560/pu/img/KOaiZVxO8H8riokY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1008094328592322560/pu/vid/240x240/jPThf4DxqmlfjHPb.mp4?tag=3

.@realdonaldtrump could pick up the phone and stop the separation of families seeking refuge in the US. Instead, he continues to hold thousands of kids hostage to try and get Congress to pay for his stupid wall. This is his policy, and he can stop it. #FamiliesBelongTogether http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgAguj4XUAAxSfl.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1008837766753476608/vid/320x180/CkJ2gCXOrH04UGKL.mp4?tag=2

RT @KamalaHarris I’m calling on Kirstjen Nielsen to resign as Secretary of Homeland Security. Under her watch, our government has committed human rights abuses by breaking up families along the southern border. And she has ​failed to be accountable to and transparent with the American people.

It's time for Secretary Nielsen to resign. The government should be in the business of keeping families together, not tearing them apart. And the government should have a commitment to transparency and accountability. Under her tenure, DHS does not have a track record of either.
